name: df-oppg
body: |- wceq(coppg, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define an opposite group, which is the same as the original group but with addition written the other way around. ~ df-oppr does the same thing for multiplication. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Aug-2015.)
